mean_cn: adj.暂时的；  n.中间时期，过渡时期
mean_en: intended to last for only a short time until somebody/something more permanent is found
sentence: The government provided us with interim housing until our new houses are ready.
sentence_trans: 在我们的新家准备好之前，政府为我们提供了临时住所。
word_etyma: inter在...之间 + im副词后缀 -\u003e interim暂时的
